{{also|青琐门}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=青琐门}}

===Etymology===
[[青]] ("green") + [[瑣]] ("chain link") + [[門]] ("gate")
: The name of one of the gates to the southern palace ([[南宮]]), which was located in [[w:Luoyang|Luoyang]] during the [[w:Han Dynasty|Han Dynasty]]. It derived its name from the fact that the top of the gate was decorated with swirl patterns (resembling the links of a chain), and the gate was painted green.
